name: DUMB STICKMAN 3 Kill Him Dash
description:
Be the boss of your dumb stickman and backflip gravity. Find ways to run and save him from 3 dangers; spikes, guards and saws, and dont die. Addicting kill madness, 2 thumbs up :)

FEATURES
- Different layouts and danger's in each level, try to find different ways and don't die.
- Great run and backflip animation as you alter gravity.
- 2 0 amazing levels to run through, 3 heart's per level.
- Cool doodle stickman style art and funny music.
- Dumb proof controls; everyone can control him easily.

FAN FYI
- More updates coming soon, always update to the new version.
- Please support us in 3 ways; download, rate, and share. Thank You!
This is doodle stickman madness at it's best.
Now go help him run and dont die ;)
